string 1:
Can you see this message? This is a communication system
called "Digiline."

You can view the messages on your Digivice. We'll make
good use of Digiline going forward.

Document: "Digiline"

View {decision}

Document: "Navigation System"

View {decision}

Good work. As you can see, coming into contact with Digimon
triggers a battle.

Battles like this are unavoidable, I'm afraid. Authorizing
use of DigiAttack {r2}.

Document: "DigiAttacks"

View {decision}

Elimination of target object confirmed. Continue heading
for the target coordinates.

That girl said that something was going to happen on the
roof.

She seems to have more information than we do. It might
be a good idea to stay with her.

Why not take a rest? Your Digivice comes with a recovery
feature.
Just stay still and don't move. Your Digimon should be healed.

Document: "Regeneration Mode"

View {decision}
What happened here? Is this what the Wall was built to hide?

Cast aside common sense here. Anomalies always go in
unexpected directions.

Document: "Conversion & Scan Rate"

View {decision}

With progressive enhancement, eventually the preemptive
strike of your DigiAttack {r2} will at times be enough to end
the battle before it even begins.

That will help you complete your mission more efficiently,
so I hope you put it to good use.

I'm going to continue upward. I'm worried about our little
friend!
Let's meet up later on the roof!

Interactions with an unknown phase electron lifeform...
Should be a valuable sample.

We'll have the analysis department examine the data.
Continue your investigation.

Unknown phase electron lifeform detected. It may know
something. Try and make contact.

No going back now. You just have to find an elevator and
press onward.

Analyze {l2} should help you find any weak spots in the wall.
View the document if you want to know how to use it.

Document: "Analyze Mode"

View {decision}

Regeneration Mode activated. Digimon HP/SP will be fully
recovered in {n0} seconds...
Regeneration Mode terminated. Digimon HP/SP fully recovered.

Digimon medical check complete.
Digimon HP/SP fully recovered.

A Digimon is {fc9now eligible for Digivolution}. View its details via
{fc15Digivice > Digimon > Digivolution}.

New {fc9Agent Skills} are now available to learn. View them under
{fc15Digivice > Agent > Agent Skills}.

{fc9{d0}} has completed their training.
If you would like it to continue training, just say the word.

Very well. It will continue with the same training. Be sure to
check in on the Digifarm from time to time.

Document: "Attachment Skills"

View {decision}
